alert.note: Alert for Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 8:38PM EDT until July 29 at 9:15PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Upton NY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Suffolk County in southeastern New York... * Until 915 PM EDT. * At 837 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Southold to near Westhampton, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Sag Harbor, Bridgehampton, Gardiners Island, Plum Island, Noyack, Shelter Island, Greenport, East Hampton, Hither Hills State Park, Springs, Water Mill, North Haven, Orient, and East Hampton Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
